June 3, 2025:GIC Re held an earnings call where they discussed the Q4 FY2025 results. The company reported a decline in net profit of 17.4% to ₹2,182.89 crore. The solvency ratio improved to 3.70, and the net worth excluding fair value change was ₹43,106.52 crores. The company also provided an update on the tail risks related to cancelled contracts.

August 13, 2025:GIC Re reported a significant increase in its Q1 FY2026 profit after tax, rising by 70% year-on-year to ₹1,752.22 crore, despite facing two significant losses during the quarter.
